title: Action Hank
description: There is no woman in distress that Action Hank can’t save. He fights a plethora of villains including the Claw, the Wrecking Crew, Black Ninja, and Bertha the Barbarian.
quote: Sometimes pain is a good thing.
altHero: Action Hank, a buff black man with a cool beard
alt1: Action Hank riding a motorcycle through a window
alt2: evil villain The Claw has a woman tied up above a tank of alligators
alt3: a warrior style villain named Bertha the Barbarian
alt4: Action Hank being approached by several sharp weapons
